question: Which among the following is not the function of the NITI Aayog?
option1: To evolve a shared vision of national development priorities sectors and strategies
option3: To create Five Year Plans for the country
option4: To create a knowledge, innovation and entrepreneurial support system
answer: To create Five Year Plans for the country
explanation: Five Year plans ended with the Planning commission. Twelfth five plans is the last five plans of India. So as of now, NITI Aayog doesnâ€™t have any role in five-year plans.
